languages.text: [Улыбнуться] "Я желаю знать, есть ли у этого творения второй том. Я поражен{mf||а} фантазией автора".
[Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться] "Я желаю знать, есть ли у этого творения второй том. Я поражен{mf||а} фантазией автора".

traits.locale_text: [Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."
[Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."
[Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."
[Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."
[Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."

languages.text: [微笑む]「この作品に第2巻があるかどうか知りたい。作者の想像力には驚かされるよ」
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."

traits.locale_text: [微笑む]「この作品に第2巻があるかどうか知りたい。作者の想像力には驚かされるよ」

languages.text: [Lächeln] "Ich wüsste gern, ob dieses Werk einen zweiten Teil hat. Die Fantasie des Verfassers ist erstaunlich."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."

traits.locale_text: [Lächeln] "Ich wüsste gern, ob dieses Werk einen zweiten Teil hat. Die Fantasie des Verfassers ist erstaunlich."

languages.text: [Sourire] « J'aimerais surtout savoir si ce chef-d'œuvre a une suite. L'imagination de l'auteur me laisse sans voix. »
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire] « J'aimerais surtout savoir si ce chef-d'œuvre a une suite. L'imagination de l'auteur me laisse sans voix. »

languages.text: [Sonreír] «Me gustaría saber si esta composición tiene una segunda parte. La imaginación del autor me ha dejado {mf|asombrado|asombrada}».
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír] «Me gustaría saber si esta composición tiene una segunda parte. La imaginación del autor me ha dejado {mf|asombrado|asombrada}».

languages.text: [微笑]“我只想知道，作品内容以后还会不会更新了？这位作者的想象力让我惊喜不已。”
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."

traits.locale_text: [微笑]“我只想知道，作品内容以后还会不会更新了？这位作者的想象力让我惊喜不已。”

languages.text: [Gülümser] "Bu eserin ikinci cildi var mı acaba? Yazarının hayal gücü beni mest etti."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I wish to know if this creation has a second volume. I am amazed by the author's imagination."

traits.locale_text: [Gülümser] "Bu eserin ikinci cildi var mı, merak ettim. Yazarının hayal gücü beni mest etti."
